title: Reflecting external dependencies
q1: Some of the other dots are:   Orange: In Sprint - my objection to this is that a story is in sprint if it is in any column from To Do to Done Purple: (Dependent upon) External Team - my objection here is that stories dependent on other teams/or being developed by other teams should have that described within the story and should be prevented from entering the sprint during sprint planning (necessarily involving reading of the story content) Pink: Low Priority - my objection to this is that any low priority story will have it's place on the board and is the responsibility of the PO to set it's position; as it's position rises so too does it's priority; hence, priority is not a static attribute but a growing one   What is the appropriate response to the Orange, Purple and Pink dots?
q2: Is there a standard practice regarding even the Red, Green, Blue and Yellow dot approach?
